meaningMnemonic: Put your <radical>fingers</radical> in your <radical>ear</radical>s when there's an <radical>explosion</radical> <kanji>in addition</kanji> to all the other things you were told to do. You have to crouch under a desk, you have to stay away from windows, you have to close your eyes. But in addition to that, you need to protect your ears!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>In addition</kanji> to all the steps you have to take to protect yourself, you can't forget that ears come in <reading>sets</reading> (せつ). You can't just stick one finger in one ear and have that be the end. You have a set of ears to worry about!
